explanation: [0-0] A man in a white T-shirt and black pants sits on a chair in a room, holding a black sword. Beside him is a table. There are two windows on the gray wall of the room and a sword rack with many swords on it. A blue carpet is spread on the brown floor.
[0-2] The man turns back to see a black car outside the window, he quickly stands up from the chair and throws the sword into the wall.
